entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is introduced as one of the twins who are peering out at Harry from behind a statue. He is described as giving Harry a mysterious wink.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is also introduced as one of the twins who are peering out at Harry from behind a statue. He is described as beaming and looking at Harry with an early Christmas present.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the main character who is being visited by Fred and George. He is curious about why they are not going to Hogsmeade.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is mentioned as a place where Harry expects Fred and George to be going, but instead they come to give him a festive cheer.

relationships.description: Fred visits Harry in an empty classroom.
George gives Harry an early Christmas present, which is a large, square piece of parchment with nothing written on it.
